original_title: As 4 Melhores Formas de Cortar Frutas
overview: Fruitful CITAC exercise in commemoration of World Theater Day
title: The 4 Best Ways to Cut Fruit

overview: Follow the disgusting and surreal journey of a man who finds himself trapped into a sickening health condition.
title: The Catheter

overview: Legend has it that the treader appears hideously on top of people who eat too much. In addition, she always appears when there is exaggeration and food is not shared with those who are hungry. It's like the sin of gluttony: "Anyone who eats and doesn't share anything gets a bloated belly", as Seu Madruga used to say. And we add: with a swollen belly, the treadmill comes and empties it.
title: A Pisadeira

overview: There have been many pretentious artists, but none matched Gascon, who dedicated all his existence to make a masterpiece of horror.
title: The Portrait of Evil

overview: After her sister's mysterious death, Sofia comes across new evidence that might enlighten the case, while a demonic entity lurks in the darkness.
title: AzulScuro

overview: "Vanity of vanities, everything is vanity" says the bible. The word flows from the tongue naming the pleasure of earthly life and judging it as beautiful, but shallow and useless; vanity is a deadly sin. A female sin. The man painted the woman, put a mirror in his hands and called it vanity. The woman in representation admires herself, but the one who really admires her body is the artist. Whose vanity? In VANITAS, we re-divide the woman in our bodies, showing the depth of what is palpable. If the Father's temple hides after death, clean and perfect, we reject them. We welcome Mother Nature in us, life-death in a perpetual sacred cycle, also honoring her dark face. You may wish to reach heaven, but it is on earth that your knees fall.
title: Vanitas

overview: Ane spends her afternoons playing around the forest with her cousins until she encounters Anhangá, an indigenous spirit that surrounds her community. But when she goes deeper into the forest, Ane is faced with a real haunting.
title: Jamary

overview: How would Nosferatu be doing in the pandemic? ‘In The Darkness’ shows a post-modern vampire, naked amidst the darkness of contemporary times, and his unpleasantness with his immutable eternity. All that told with a lot of humor and irony - proper for those who can see... even in the dark.
title: In The Darkness

overview: The presence of a sinister figure in Bruna's childhood, generated a trauma that she was not able to overcome even after being an adult. Was this creation just the result of Bruna's imagination or was this nightmare closer to reality than she imagined?
title: The Man Without a Face

original_title: Queens vs Zombies From Outer Space
overview: At a wedding party, while the queens get into a mess, a contagion comes from an alien from outer space. Queens need to unite against this new and real enemy, but never forgetting to touch up lipstick.
title: Queens vs Zombies From Outer Space

overview: Helldose is an anthology where the hostess leads her guests to prove five different flavors from the depths of hell.
title: Helldose

original_title: A Verdade Sai de Seu Poço Para Envergonhar a Humanidade
overview: Natália is a college student who still lives with her parents, in her childhood home. Her estranged older sister arrives for a visit, bringing along infancy memories Natália doesn't recall. Her sleepless nights digging through her archives seem to trigger strange phenomena that might threaten Natália's safety.
title: Truth Comes Out of its Well to Shame Mankind

overview: In an alternate reality, Fidel Castro uses genetic engineering to build the new man and thus save utopia. The experiment fails as these beings are highly intelligent but also cruel and uncontrollable. Rejected by their own creators, a group organizes a series of terrorist actions, and chaos reigns on the island. One of its members traces the origin of their genes and begins a journey to try to discover their humanity.
title: Blue Heart

overview: A killer in search of his next victim ends up distracting himself on the way with kittens and video games.
title: The Incredibly Distracted Killer

original_title: A Botija, O Beato e a Besta-Fera
title: A Botija, O Beato e a Besta-Fera

original_title: As Almas que Dançam no Escuro
overview: A grieving father goes after the one responsible for the death of his daughter and discovers secrets that the young girl had hidden before she died. His search takes him to a nightclub where an enigmatic host promises to help him in exchange for something. Little did the father know the consequences of this agreement.
title: Souls Dancing in the Dark

overview: The tale of a shattered La Ursa, an imprisoned image that carries another one within it, a lurking one. From the inside of the void, La Ursa faces back a turmoil world that crumbles and destabilizes. You can only see a reflection, a snip, a Carcase.
title: La Ursa's Carcase

overview: Five young actors travel to an isolated house, surrounded by forest, for a weekend to shoot a movie. What they still don't know is that this will be the scene of mysterious events. Will they be able to finish the movie before they finish it?
title: O Segredo de Sara

overview: Ricardo and Joana are having their first date, and are surprised by a stranger. Trapped, they are at the mercy of this man, who may have more in common with Ricardo than he realizes.
title: Two Wolves

overview: At nightfall, Gabriela arrives home and witnesses a supernatural manifestation through a headset she just bought at a bazaar. Through the acquisition, a message tries to reach her.
title: Late Frequency

overview: Panamerica, 1980. A stupid government decides that all citizens must participate in a deadly car race and sends an evil army to hunt down those who resist.
title: Savage Formula

overview: By day, Mari and her friends broadcast their spiritual devotion through pastel pinks and catchy evangelical songs about purity and perfection, and by night they form a vigilante girl gang, prowling the streets in search of sinners who have deviated from the rightful path. After an attack goes wrong, leaving Mari scarred and unemployed, her views of community, religion, and her peers begin to shift.
title: Medusa

overview: When Laura goes to her parents' summer home to work on her senior thesis, she meets Carmilla, a mysterious but familiar tenant. Laura is attracted to Carmilla and, as her attraction grows, she begins to unravel the dark history between them.
title: Carmilla

overview: A woman tries to help her twin sister, with whom she has a strong connection, recover from a trauma. But weird things surround their lives.
title: Insensate

overview: A poetic ode to queer masculinity, fetishism of the body, sweat and blood, a burning phantasm.
title: Macho Carne

overview: A tale about the apocalypse of the working class.
title: The Infernal Machine

original_title: Quando Chegar a Noite, Pise Devagar
overview: "Be Silent at Night", Caia reads on a wall in the apartment she has just moved in. Among the insistent innuendos by the new neighbor and the presence of her insurgent body in a new location, Caia begins to live inside a horror movie. In Gabriela Alcântara's film, the protagonist resorts to the protection of the Orixás to confront her fears and hauntings, experiencing magic through the strength of the herbs and the women around her.
title: When the Night Comes, Step Slowly

overview: A father is hypnotized on his deathbed, following his own method, and is left hanging between life, death, and dreams.
title: The Abyss of the Soul

overview: A religious pilgrimage marches in search of a holy place. A miracle is performed and witnessed. The archipelago's fury is appeased. Another prosperous year for the islanders begins. A look at folklore and superstition in the Azores.
title: Misericórdia

overview: A detective questions the similarities between the crime he investigates and his own actions after waking up to a dead woman, with no memory of the night before.
title: Oblívio

overview: Brazil. It's night. Mother and son discover they are not alone during quarantine.
title: Quarentena

original_title: Brinquedos revoltados de Plutão que não é mais planeta
overview: The creators of The Incredibly Distracted Killer, Jonathan Rodrigues and Eduardo Carvalho present their new short. A lonely child finds a toy box of unknown origin and strange things happening tomorrow.
title: Revolted toys from Pluto that is no longer a planet

overview: Muriel can't sleep. It's been one year since her mother's suicide, but somehow she's still there. A miracle might be about to happen.
title: Muriel

overview: A group of students have an online meeting to do their homework, untill weird things start to happen.
title: A Sombra do Medo

overview: During a world calamity, a young couple disagrees on how to deal with the situation after a controversial statement made by the president.
title: Out There

overview: In July 2015, four teenagers disappeared while signing a documentary. Three months later... his recording was found.
title: The Devil's Executioner

overview: A woman keeps killing the same man while on her sleep.
title: Sleepwalker

overview: Six young people decide to take a walk in the forest one weekend. Among them are Beto, Marcos, Diana, Kauã, Carol and Jessica who decide to venture into the woods, but soon realize they are being pursued by a mysterious creature and only an old hunter can help them.
title: Curupira: O Demônio da Floresta

overview: A troubled family deals with disturbing and horrifying changes in their lives after a serious accident unravels dark mysteries from the past.
title: Lacuna

overview: A movie about the blue ghost and missing people on halloween
title: Kill yourself on halloween

overview: In 1946, in Soror city, three different stories intersect amid macabre events. While detectives Thomas and Carlos work in the unsolved cases of the mysterious body found in a tree and Serena Caires disappearance, those three stories get together suggesting the motivations of those respective crimes.
title: Soror

overview: An exorcism goes terribly wrong as the entity searches for a stronger host.
title: The Evil Within

overview: While out for a walk in the countryside, Marina and Juvenal stop to take some pictures in front of an old woman’s house. Annoyed, the old woman turns out to be a witch and casts a curse on the young couple in the form of a wound that feeds on raw flesh.
title: The Curse

overview: A eukaryotic film immersed in multispecies relationships. Loosely adapted from "A Cosmopolítica dos Animais" [The Cosmopolitcs of Animals] (Juliana Fausto, n-1 edições, 2020).
title: The Cosmopolitics of Animals

overview: Madorna, is the uncontrollable desire to sleep, giving us the intermediate state between sleep and wakefulness, the exact moment when we cannot distinguish between reality and dream.
title: Madorna

overview: Ignacio is locked in a hotel room.  Stunned by a giant and frighteningly bizarre insect, he sees a way out when Arthur knocks on his door.
title: Inseto

overview: Joseph is a promising violinist who has just broken off his engagement. Shaken, he seeks isolation to rehearse Tartini's "Devil Trill", but on the spot he is besieged by his personal demons.
title: Spalla

overview: After suffering trauma, a girl plans her revenge.  Violent traumas from the past haunt a young woman's life. She spends her days silently planning her revenge on those who hurt her. Your punishment will be severe.
title: Sayonara

overview: Julia and Fabiana are bored, working inside their apartment, until the two find a mysterious board game.
title: O Último Bramido

overview: A young female photographer is surprised by a package left on her doorstep. She comes across an old camera that reveals her latest photo.
title: Diga Xis

overview: In the underground of a besieged city, a soldier awaits his fate. Meanwhile, in the ruins of the surface, the dangerous Cannibal runs wild.
title: Extremo Ocidente

original_title: A Macabra Biblioteca do Dr. Lucchetti
overview: The year is 1959. The place, Curitiba, Brazil. Private detective John Clayton is hired by the mysterious and seductive Helen Zola to investigate her husband, a scientist with a secret and abominable past. Against the wishes of his faithful friend Vonetta, Clayton accepts the case and gradually finds himself in the middle of a dark plot involving a library created by the legendary Dr. Lucchetti, which harbors the secrets of monsters, vampires and other macabre creatures.
title: Dr. Lucchetti's Macabre Atheneum

overview: Diana, a pregnant architect, is hired to work in the renovation of the old Cinema Khouri, abandoned after the tragic death of a child. However, when she gets trapped inside there, Diana discovers the old cinema is not only alive, but hides an entity that wishes to keep her in there forever.
title: The Ruins of Cinema Khouri

original_title: A Câmara de Torturas Sexuais do Doutor Josefel
overview: The girls just want a weekend away from the "good citizen", but when they find them, there's only one place to practice their perversions!  The Sexual Torture Chamber of Doctor Josefel is a collage project, using various clips from trailers and exploitation films in the public domain available on the archive.org website, with music also in the public domain and/or royalty free.
title: The Sexual Torture Chamber of Doctor Josefel

overview: Before getting vaccinated, he just wanted a walk in the park, but when he loses his father, he will have to face all the dangers of the woods.  Batata Filmes presents its new project, a short film that brings together several references to talk about vaccination and children's imagination, with good doses of apprehension and terror.
title: The Park Stroll

overview: A woman gets trapped into the bathroom, there she must face her fears and a supernatural entity.
title: Phobia

overview: A remake of one of the episodes written by R. F. Lucchetti for the TV Bandeirantes series "Além, Muito Além do Além" (1968). At the time, this series was presented by Zé do Caixão and in this remake he is presented by his daughter, Liz Marins, with her character Liz Vamp.
title: A Testemunha

overview: A man closes the door of his house and feels an unexpected dread. After a brief period of recovery, the man seeks help to face his fear and reveals to his interviewer the real reason for his fears: creatures that try to invade his home.
title: Atrás da Porta

overview: A young girl is taken in chains to an abandoned house. What does her jailer hide?
title: Refém

overview: "HEART-STOPPING TRAIN" discusses what exists between life and death, between space and time. It is a narrative that twists the viewer beyond, exploring the pain and sadness of human existence.
title: HEART-STOPPING TRAIN

overview: A film that seeks to understand the shadows of the collective unconscious through the technical improvement and aesthetic refinement of the moving image. The film also mixes dramatic and playful elements, as it is necessary to break the chains of the past to survive a punishing reality. Vivid and impactful colors lead to a dreamlike environment. Fantastic and terrifying figures pass through the memories of a tormented man. Was this film a dream?
title: Request Soul
